data.title: St. George’s Anglican Church
data.meta_description: Location of the exhibition space: the church is situated in Campo San Vio, in the heart of Venice’s “art kilometer” between the Accademia Gallery, Palazzo Cini, the Peggy Guggenheim Collection, Punta della Dogana, and the Vedova Museum. The central nave measures about 200 sq.m.
data.text:
Location of the exhibition space: the church is situated in Campo San Vio, in the heart of Venice’s “art kilometer” between the Accademia Gallery, Palazzo Cini, the Peggy Guggenheim Collection, Punta della Dogana, and the Vedova Museum. The central nave measures about 200 sq.m.

How to get there / Transport of the works of art: within easy distance of the Actv Accademia stop (lines 1 and 2), and Zattere stop (lines 5.1, 5.2, and 6), and Alilaguna which connects to Marco Polo airport. Works of art can be loaded/unloaded on the Rio di San Vio in front of the church.

Facilities: electricity, heating, fire extinguishers, staff bathroom, disabled access.
